task.title: Connect the Capacitor
task.shortdesc: Soldering the ends of the capacitor to the tone pot.

step.cmd: Choose a leg of the capacitor to be the "hot" end.

info.note: Since this kind of capacitor is non-polarized, meaning current can flow in either direction, it does not matter which end you choose to be the hot end.

step.cmd: Solder the hot end Lug 2 of the tone pot.

substep.cmd: Place the other leg of the capacitor against the tone pot case and fold the end to be parallel with the pot casing.
Solder the folded end to the pot casing.
